title: That we might have joy
description: In a general conference address in April 1993, President Howard W. Hunter asked members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day saints "How often do we think of the savior? How deeply and gratefully and how adoringly do we reflect on his life? How central to our lives do we know him to be?" Living a more Christlike life has long been a theme of President Hunter's messages to the Saints.
author: Howard W. Hunter
